"Self-Reflecting Surface": A material that reflects only the person standing in front of it, creating a unique and personalized reflection.
"Mirrored Lenses": A pair of glasses with lenses that reflect the person wearing them, creating a personal and portable reflection.
"Reflection-Shifting Technology": A device that can shift the reflection of a mirror to a different location, allowing you to see your reflection from a distance.
"Self-Reflection App": A smartphone app that uses the front-facing camera to reflect your image back at you, eliminating the need for a physical mirror.
"Mirrorless Mirror": A mirror that can create a reflection without actually reflecting itself, allowing you to see your reflection without creating an infinite loop of reflections.
